title: Women Beaten on Suspicion of Child Lifting, No Communal Angle
subtitle: A video which shows two women being beaten up by a crowd is being shared on WhatsApp with a claim that ‘Hindus are thrashing Muslims’ in India. The women are lying in mud and are repeatedly slapped and punched by a mob.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A video which shows two women being beaten up by a crowd is being shared on WhatsApp with a claim that ‘Hindus are thrashing Muslims’ in India. The women are lying in mud and are repeatedly slapped and punched by a mob.

The Quint received a query about it on its WhatsApp number.
